person.persName: Henry Erskine Spilman (Campbell County clerk and deputy sheriff)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky clerk and deputy sheriff. Married Frances Walker Spilman. Father of Marie Katherine Spilman. Campbell County Deputy Sheriff in 1862.
